alert.note: Alert for Cleburne; Independence; Izard; Jackson; Lawrence; Sharp; Stone; White (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 4:35AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Stone, Independence, southeastern Izard, Jackson, northeastern Cleburne, north central White, southwestern Lawrence and southern Sharp Counties through 530 AM CDT... At 434 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles west of Annieville to near Mount Pleasant to near Mountain View. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Batesville... Newport... Mountain View... Cave City... Tuckerman... Diaz... Newark... Swifton... Pangburn... Cushman... Mount Pleasant... Grubbs... Pleasant Plains... Strawberry... Lynn... Oil Trough... Concord... Jacksonport... Magness... Sidney... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 600 AM CDT for eastern and north central Arkansas.

area.areaDesc: Cleburne; Independence; Izard; Jackson; Lawrence; Sharp; Stone; White
